Celtic Chicago, Inc. is a full-service communications agency that launches products and brands with dynamic strategy and stellar creativity. Each of Celtic’s four distinct divisions, including Advertising, Digital, PR/social and Association Management, is made up of experienced professionals with diverse talents. 
We have an extensive client roster made up of B2B, B2C and nonprofits and our insightful approach to any marketing challenge allows client businesses to constantly move forward.
